text: Cybill is an American television sitcom created by Chuck Lorre and starring Cybill Shepherd which aired on CBS from January 2, 1995, to July 13, 1998. == Series overview == == Episodes == ===Season 1 (1995)=== ===Season 2 (1995–96)=== ===Season 3 (1996–97)=== ===Season 4 (1997–98)=== ==References== ==External links== * * * Category:Lists of American sitcom episodes
